var.name: chapterEmbedded
var.desc: Defines if chapter-overview is always shown (embedded) in surface

var.name: chapDynResize
var.desc: Activates dynamic resizing of the chapter-overview

var.name: chapColor[1]
var.desc: Background-Color of currently not viewed Entry

var.name: chapColor[2]
var.desc: Background-Color of mouse-hovered (currently not viewed) Entry

var.name: ausschnittParentMODDED
var.desc: Parent Element of the Cutout Class

var.name: GESAMT_SCROLL
var.desc: Size of the Buttons for the Scrollbars

var.name: DampInViewer
var.desc: Defines if the Damper is located within the Viewer or somewhere else
